Name: Mercenary Leto
About the game: Action, upgrades, and one cool cat wizard. Travel the galaxy as a mercenary with a fluffy dragon alongside a cast of endearing characters. This game is a 2d action platformer with a retro-SNES vibe about it. Alongside the mechanics is a cast of characters that I really want to stand out - from a talking cat wizard to a skeleton in a kimono, you'll meet interesting tropes of NPCs, who then shortly begin to surprise and grow on you - just like real people do! This is a huge focus for us - a cast to remember. So, in short - Tight controls and movement Great characters to love (or hate!) A fluffy dragon. It's very fluffy.
